Title: A historical place
Question:
Describe a historical place you visited. You should say:
- Where it is located
- What you did there
- Why it is important to you
SampleAnswer:
One historical place I visited is the Great Wall of China...

Firstly, it was unforgettable because...

Secondly, the views were breathtaking...
Part3Question: What role does preserving historical places play in educating future generations?

Title: A skill you want to learn
Question:
Describe a skill you would like to learn. You should say:
- What the skill is
- Why you want to learn it
- How you plan to learn it
SampleAnswer:
The skill I want to learn is playing the piano...

Firstly, I have always been fascinated by music...

Secondly, it is a skill that brings joy...
